name: Him and I
description:
Him&I is an indie2D action-adventure game.Its subject is about the relationship between a father and son who go to the North Star after a year the virus broke out.Throughout the game,it displays the fears,feelings,losses and the struggles of the main characters.

FEATURES:

Soulful, character-rich story with an emphasis on drama and humor.
An lovely story told through cinematic sequences.
Includes mini combinations and quick time events.
